name: Pumpkin People Dress Up
description:
For the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022).

Dress your pumpkin person up with  endless combinations, make them smile, make them frown, make them into a witch, or even make them clown around!

Art by Calico Cub

Music by Corrin Coffey (corrincoffeymusic.com)

Programming by Honey Bear
